Venue

San Diego Marriott of Mission Valley
8757 Rio San Diego Dr, San Diego, CA 92108

Welcome to San Diego!

This year's venue is the San Diego Marriott of Mission Valley! Located just 20 minutes from San Diego International Airport and under 15 minutes from the glorious San Diego Zoo, the Marriott of Mission Valley provides the perfect setting.

San Diego Marriott of Mission Valley is only steps away from the beautiful San Diego River Trail, which is great for your morning run or bike ride.

View Larger Map

Staying at the San Diego Marriott Mission Valley

Our group rate of $179/night expires on August 21, so don't wait to book your room!

  • Free Wi-Fi
  • Room for hallway hacking
  • Short trip to downtown
  • Heated outdoor pool

If you have any problem booking your room, please contact Allison, our Marriott representative, at (619) 209-6609.

Around San Diego

Public transportation is available via the San Diego Metropolitan Transit System which includes the San Diego Trolley and city buses. Popular ride sharing services are also available. While you're cruising around town, be sure to check out our favorite spots:

Broken Yolk Cafe

Website: Broken Yolk Cafe
Distance: .6mi away
Address: 1760 Camino Del Rio N
A San Diego all-day breakfast spot known for high quality and large portions.

In-n-Out Burger

Website: In-n-Out Burger
Distance: .6mi away
Address: 2005 Camino Del Este
The classic California no frills burger drive thru. Open until at least 1am.

The Kebab Shop

Website: The Kebab Shop
Distance: .9mi away
Address: 1570 Camino De La Reina
A San Diego take on Mediterranean comfort food.

Lestat's Coffee House

Website: Lestat's Coffee House
Distance: 2.2mi away
Address: 3343 Adams Ave
A 24-hour coffee shop in the Normal Heights neighborhood of San Diego

Lucha Libre Taco Shop

Website: Lucha Libre Taco Shop
Distance: 2.5mi away
Address: 3016 University Ave
A taco shop featuring Mexican wrestling, monster burritos and an attitude with two nearby locations.

Modern Times Beer

Website: Modern Times Beer
Distance: 2.9mi away
Address: 3000 Upas St
One of San Diego's best breweries with two tasting rooms in North Park and Point Loma.

Pizzeria Luigi

Website: Pizzeria Luigi
Distance: 1.6mi away
Address: 2121 El Cajon Blvd
New York style pizza available by the slice. Eat in or have it delivered.

Streetcar Merchants

Website: Streetcar Merchants
Distance: 2.3mi away
Address: 4002 30th St
A Louisiana style fried chicken, doughnuts, and coffee shop in the trendy North Park neighborhood.

An Accessible Experience

We're working with the staff at the San Diego Marriott to accommodate the diverse needs of our attendees.

Are we missing something? Let us know.

  • There is step-free access to all parts of the venue.
  • All public restrooms have accessible stalls.
  • San Diego Marriott does not provide gender-neutral restrooms. Please use the restroom for the gender with which you identify.
  • Service animals are welcome, and there is a grassy area to the left of the hotel where they can be walked.
  • The Quiet Room is in the Private Dining Room on all conference days. This room is not for socializing.
  • A Lactation Room will be available as needed Sunday-Wednesday in Santa Fe 3. A refrigerator will be available in that room. Read more about using the lactation room.
  • Attend a recovery meeting. There are many recovery meetings near the conference hotel, which can be seen on a map here. These include traditional AA meetings, LBGTQ community meetings, secular meetings, and more. If you need more information or want to carpool to meetings, please contact recovery@pyphilly.org. Anonymity will be maintained.
  • Sponsored childcare will be provided.

Got questions? We can help: hello@djangocon.us
